name: Hosta Shoot Kimchi
ingredients: 1 pound (455 g) hosta shoots (or napa cabbage, or other vegetable) (roughly 6 loosely packed cups)
3 ounces (85 g) daikon radish, sliced into ¼-inch (6 mm) half-moons (about ½ cup)
3 ounces (85 g) ramp leaves (or green onions, sliced into 1-inch / 2.5 cm lengths)
Scant ¾ ounce (20 g / 3 teaspoons) kosher salt
1 tablespoon white rice flour or grind white rice as finely as possible in a coffee grinder
¼ cup (30 g) Korean gochugaru chili flakes (coarse)

instructions.en: Cut the hostas into 1-inch (2.5 cm) pieces and combine in a bowl with the radish, ramp leaves or onions, and salt. Mix very well and allow to sit for an hour or two.
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte hosty na kusy s dĺžkou 1 palec (2,5 cm) a skombinujte ich v miske s reďkovkou, listami rampy alebo cibuľou a soľou. Dobre premiešajte a nechajte stáť jednu alebo dve hodiny.
instructions.ja: ホスタを1インチ（2.5 cm）の大きさに切り、ボウルに大根、ランプの葉または玉ねぎ、塩と一緒に入れます。よく混ぜて、1〜2時間置いておきます。

instructions.en: Bring the water, maple syrup, and fish sauce to a simmer with the rice flour until thickened. Cool to room temperature, then mix with the chili flakes, garlic, and ginger.
instructions.sk: Varte vodu, javorový sirup a rybaciu omáčku na miernom ohni s ryžovou múkou, kým sa nezahustí. Nechajte vychladnúť na izbovú teplotu a potom zmiešajte s chili vločkami, cesnakom a zázvorom.
instructions.ja: 水、メープルシロップ、魚醤を米粉と一緒に煮立たせ、濃くなるまで加熱します。室温まで冷やし、次に唐辛子フレーク、ニンニク、ショウガと混ぜます。

instructions.en: Rinse the salted hosta mixture well, drain, and pat dry with a towel if needed to remove excess moisture. Toss the hosta mixture with the chili paste, then pack into a quart (945 ml) jar.
instructions.sk: Dobre opláchnite soľný hosta zmes, sceďte a ak je to potrebné, osušte uterákom, aby ste odstránili prebytočnú vlhkosť. Zmiešajte hosta zmes s chili pastou a potom ju naplňte do litrového (945 ml) pohára.
instructions.ja: 塩漬けのホスタ混合物をよくすすぎ、排水し、必要に応じてタオルで乾かして余分な水分を取り除きます。ホスタ混合物を唐辛子ペーストと混ぜ、1クォート（945 ml）の瓶に詰めます。

instructions.en: Screw on the lid and leave out for 2 to 5 days, depending on how sour you want the kimchi to be, removing the lid occasionally to let carbon dioxide escape, then refrigerate.
instructions.sk: Zaskrutkujte viečko a nechajte ho vonku 2 až 5 dní, v závislosti od toho, ako kyslé chcete, aby kimchi bolo, občas odstráňte viečko, aby sa uvoľnil oxid uhličitý, a potom ho uložte do chladničky.
instructions.ja: 蓋を締めて、キムチの酸味の好みに応じて2〜5日間外に置き、時々蓋を外して二酸化炭素を逃がし、その後冷蔵します。

notes: Adjust the sour flavor by leaving it out longer for a stronger taste. The kimchi will last for a month or longer if kept submerged in its liquid.
